column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////the best pizza I have ever in my life had. Soooo good
column4: and sooo far away from California(and even more to ship to CA). Seriously
column5: the pizza was amazing.  We got the sausage and I think I had 4 whole pieces to myself
column6: thats how good it was.  I dream of being back in Chicago and having pizza here again and I cant wait to introduce my boyfriend to it.  We recently had pizza for the first time in NYC at Grimaldis while we were visiting and Grimaldis had NOTHING on Lou's! 5 stars for Lou's!
